tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
    plant_id INT,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE geothermal_power_plants (
    plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_maintenance (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_service_date DATE,
    service_provider VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATETIME,
    technician_name VARCHAR(100),
    CONSTRAINT fk_plant_id FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES geothermal_power_plant(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(100),
    installation_date DATE,
    maintenance_period INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_plant_id FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES geothermal_power_plant(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlantMaintenances (
  plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentMaintenances (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE PlantEquipment (
  plant_id INT,
  equipment_id INT,
  installation_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (plant_id, equipment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician_name VARCHAR(100),
  labor_hours INT
)

CREATE TABLE geothermal_plants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  location TEXT,
  commission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type TEXT,
  cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
  equip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  equip_name TEXT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  condition TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_personnel (
  personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  role TEXT,
  contact_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_description TEXT,
  frequency INT,
  last_performed DATE,
  next_due DATE
)
